title: Total surplus maximized at allocative efficiency

content.question: If a perfectly competitive market with no government intervention is allocatively efficient, which of the following must be true?

choices.label: Consumer surplus plus producer surplus is at its maximum.
Consumer surplus is larger than producer surplus.
Producer surplus is larger than consumer surplus.

content.answer: Consumer surplus plus producer surplus is at its maximum.
